channel.title: Help Pls!
channel.description:
I have a Wrt54 g Wireless router but im making it where ppl can connect to it.im connected by wire but ive done the following portforwarding
Going to control panel going to firewall turned off firewall made my exceptions Done!
If i need more then pls help

item.title: Help Pls!
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

[quote=“Owner Undead, post:1, topic:349320”]I have a Wrt54 g Wireless router but im making it where ppl can connect to it.im connected by wire but ive done the following portforwarding

Going to control panel
going to firewall
turned off firewall
made my exceptions
Done!

If i need more then pls help[/quote]

you have to go to your online firewall and add the port there also soo there are tons of tutorials on this if you just search it. if you dont understand download teamviewer pm your pass and ID and ill take a look at it

Read full topic
